phrs.translation: 肢残, 残缺, 毁尸, 致残毁
自我伤害, 自伤行为, 自我损伤, 翻译
牛残割, 牛残, 牛切割, 检体采取
有自伤的伤害, 有自伤的危险

sentences.sentence: Thousands suffered death or mutilation in the bomb blast.
sentences.translation: 在炸弹爆炸事件中，数千人被炸死，或成为残废。

sentences.sentence: The right to object to any distortion, mutilation or modification of the work.
sentences.translation: 反对任何窜改、肢体不全或是修改作品的权利。

sentences.sentence: Despite the mutilation and terror the child experienced, police say he was one of the lucky ones.
sentences.translation: 尽管这个孩子遭受到肢残和恐惧，警察说他还是幸运的一个。
